channel.title: VanityPS
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img839/9987/vanityfixedzpsc7a739c4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/343sprm.png[/img][URL=http://vanity-ps.com/forums/]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/20ti1ko.png[/img][URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/exsjg5nad9undbw/Vanity%20V1.zip?dl=1&token_hash=AAF4BICzxFX4MjJI_JDWHiO-uBGo6Uuzlu6tvySLdmKYyg/"]Download Client[/URL] [SIZE=4]Features:[/SIZE]
-We have a great community. -11X Experience rate for new players -Able to choose between old and new hit splats/hp -Custom in-game player titles -Active, large, and helpful staff team -Development team is constantly updating and pushing out content -Good voting rewards -Regularly updated Wiki guide including 6 different languages -We have our own, up to date price guide -Castle wars -Fight caves -God wars -Nex armors & working Korasi, and new firecape -Curse prayers -100% working claws -Unique Bloodlust system for small teams -Wilderness targets with rewards -Stable and Strong economy -starter packs with everything a new player needs -Pk points system - able to redeem for all the best items. -Tons of items! -Ganodermic armour -Pvp armour's -Working spirit shields -New staff event organizer -Mod day events -Kill streaks -EP -24/7 Uptime [No Lag] -Dicing both bag and NPC! -Top pker announcements
[U] [FONT=Arial Black]Media[/FONT][/U] [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=39hZ9zU_lO8]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=39hZ9zU_lO8[/URL] [url=http://gyazo.com/934c3f7bf1148648abce6fcb156027cc]http://gyazo.com/934c3f7bf1148648abce6fcb156027cc[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4tNokqb.png[/img] [IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/401/ryvi.png[/img] [IMG]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/3702/fe7g.png[/img] [IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/8493/6ko1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j2P7ZDe.png[/img] [IMG]http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/2865/i8ar.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Lu35PfI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Woekw2J.png[/img] [IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/7253/zry9.png[/img] [IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/3158/8n1i.png[/img]
Why choose Vanity over other private servers? We offer the greatest staff of them all that have experience and know how to handle the situations with the right consequences, we've got tons of Pking action going on but do realise we're still a fairly new runescape private server that has just launched but you'll never know the experience unless you give Vanity a shot, We encourage all the aspects of PvMing,Staking,Pking we have over 50 Bosses that are waitng to be slain by you, don't believe us? only one way to find out come give Vanity a try and trust me you won't regret it. The moment you log in you'll never log out.[/center]

item.title: VanityPS
item.dc:creator: @VanityPS VanityPS
item.description:
@VanityPS wrote:

[CENTER]

[URL=http://vanity-ps.com/forums/]Forums[/URL]
[URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/exsjg5nad9undbw/Vanity%20V1.zip?dl=1&token_hash=AAF4BICzxFX4MjJI_JDWHiO-uBGo6Uuzlu6tvySLdmKYyg/"]Download Client[/URL]
[SIZE=4]Features:[/SIZE]

-We have a great community.
-11X Experience rate for new players
-Able to choose between old and new hit splats/hp
-Custom in-game player titles
-Active, large, and helpful staff team
-Development team is constantly updating and pushing out content
-Good voting rewards
-Regularly updated Wiki guide including 6 different languages
-We have our own, up to date price guide
-Castle wars
-Fight caves
-God wars
-Nex armors & working Korasi, and new firecape
-Curse prayers
-100% working claws
-Unique Bloodlust system for small teams
-Wilderness targets with rewards
-Stable and Strong economy
-starter packs with everything a new player needs
-Pk points system - able to redeem for all the best items.
-Tons of items!
-Ganodermic armour
-Pvp armour’s
-Working spirit shields
-New staff event organizer
-Mod day events
-Kill streaks
-EP
-24/7 Uptime [No Lag]
-Dicing both bag and NPC!
-Top pker announcements

[U]

Why choose Vanity over other private servers? We offer the greatest staff of them all that have experience and know how to handle the situations with the right consequences, we’ve got tons of Pking action going on but do realise we’re still a fairly new runescape private server that has just launched but you’ll never know the experience unless you give Vanity a shot, We encourage all the aspects of PvMing,Staking,Pking we have over 50 Bosses that are waitng to be slain by you, don’t believe us? only one way to find out come give Vanity a try and trust me you won’t regret it. The moment you log in you’ll never log out.[/center]
